A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie had pacing issues. There were initially 3 story lines\, one of which had way too much going on\, and one which moved PAINFULLY slow. There were at least 3 times where the movie would cut back to Ray and Luke and they would repeat the scene:
Ray: "But you're the last hope"
Luke: "But I don't wanna"
And that story arch was disappointing\, didn't end up being super important.
Also\, SEVERAL scenes where they would zoom in on someone looking off into the distance
SEVERAL scenes where someone was giving an "emotional speech".
Kept hitting you on the head with call backs to "A new hope". Did not live up to The Force Awakens\, or Rogue One.
